resources.string: Please turn on Wi-Fi if there is no network connection on your tablet.Please check and make sure your tablet has been connected successfully with the nearby available network.
The dock phone battery has been removed already if there is no dock phone battery included in your Telpad.
Sticker on box: No battery will be included with your Telpad dock. The Telpad will operate via a plugged power adapter.

How to remove the battery from the Telpad dock : 
 1.Remove the Telpad from the dock, and unplug the adaptor and phone line. 
 2.Open the battery cover at the bottom of the dock. 
 3.Remove the battery from the battery case. 
 4.Put the battery cover back into place, and reconnect the plug adaptor and phone line.Put back the Telpad on the dock.

How to properly dispose of the removed battery: 
 1.Dispose of batteries in accordance with local, state and federal laws and regulations. 
 2.Do not put batteries into your regular or bulk trash collection. 
 3.Do not put batteries in fire as they may explode. 
 4.Do not allow children or pets near the battery. 
 5.Do not smash or pierce the battery,or expose it to high external pressure.
Are you the PLDT HOME Telpad subscriber on record? If not, please turn over the Telpad to the subscriber to perform the necessary next steps.
Please indicate your name as shown in your PLDT billing statement.
In order to ensure your safety, we would like to advise you to remove the battery from your Telpad dock. The Telpad will continue to operate via a plugged power adapter.
Please read \"How to remove battery from Telpad dock\" and \"How to properly dispose of the removed battery\" carefully.
I have read and will follow all guidelines regarding proper dock battery handling.
The battery in my Telpad dock has been removed already.

Legal notices: \nI have confirmed that I am the PLDT HOME Telpad subscriber on record. I have also been informed on how to remove and dispose of the Telpad dock battery and have removed the battery from my Telpad dock. PLDT will not be liable for any incidents, damage, injury, loss, charges or claims arising from the non-removal of the Telpad dock battery.
I have read all legal notices.
